phrases: How can you eat in a place like this...
You suddenly decide you are hungry...
and take everthing out of my backpack!
What is wrong with having a leisurely lunch...
by a pretty stream or a field of flowers?
your country has many convenient things.
I was shocked at your bicycle.
But a thing that tells time...
and by looking at your strange foodstuffs...
you do much trade with foreigners from the south.
However, did you know that cup noodle was invented by the Japanese?
It was intended for use up in outer space.
Oh yeah, did you know we even went to the moon!
and fire shoots out from the bottom...
By next time, I will have studied up on it!
Master Inuyasha, you must not litter!
This is no time to be concerned about that!
Why are you lining up behind me?
A fragment of the Sacred Jewel!
Why are you after the Sacred Jewel fragment?
So you wanted to gain strength...
by using the Sacred Jewel fragment?
They annihilated the enemy in one blow!
Boy, was not that fun, Manten?
I have so much power left over.
The power of the Sacred Jewel imbedded in my forehead is real.
So let us keep gathering more and more, Manten!
We will look high and low for beasts like this fox who possess the Sacred Jewel
Your father possessed a Sacred Jewel fragment?!
Those two go around killing demons who possess fragments.
I have heard that they are unruly, mean brothers.
If we defeat them, we will get several fragments at once!
You would not be able to take them on!
You are just a half-demon, are not you?
I can smell the human in you!
you should stay out of demon affairs!
That was not a nice thing to...
As long as the charm stays on...
the jizo statue will not move!
You are partly to blame, too.
I do not like to play tricks on women, but...
I need you to sleep for a while!
I will use this to lure out the Thunder Brothers!
Give them back or I will get mad!
If only I had a little more hair.
Then I would be popular like Brother Hiten.
He is not coming after me.
If it are not the son of that fox I killed!
Your father's fur is sooo warm!
How dare you do that to my father...
Hey, those are Sacred Jewel fragments!
Those are the fragments of the Sacred Jewel.
I will hit you right in the brain next!
I just asked you to peel off the charm!
He has two fragments in his forehead!
If I aim there, I can bring him down!
My father was killed by that!
Why, it is only a woman!
You helped me, yet I abandoned you and ran away!
Master Inuyasha, I cannot peel this charm off.
I am willing to help you.
But you must promise NOT to hit me.
I will not hit you, stupid!
You promised not to hit me!
Kagome's been captured by the Thunder Brothers!
This is no time for that!
They are the ones that killed your father?
You do not look like you avenged his death.
Did you hide and watch Kagome being kidnapped?
Well, why do not you grovel at my feet?
Then I will let bygones be bygones.
Shippo, just do as he says.
You need to act like an adult now.
Why must I stoop so low?!
But I cannot save her by myself.
The flesh and blood of pretty, young women promote healthy hair.
I am going to boil you down into a potion and apply it to my head.
I would rather be eaten than put on your head!!
If Brother Hiten finds you here, he will really eat you!
You do not look alike at all!
Do not worry, I will not lay claim on her.
I have got a better woman right here!
Maybe he will be more receptive.
Did you find a new Sacred Jewel fragment?
Do not tell me that you were more interested in a woman...
and failed to get the Sacred Jewel fragment?!
If you were not my kid brother...
you would not have enough lives to survive!
That fox tyke has the Sacred Jewel fragments?!
Are you going to go for them, Brother Hiten?
It is my chance to escape!
I am going to kill you so you cannot escape!
I need you to make my hair potion!
If you kill me, you will not...
Will not be able to get the Sacred Jewel fragments!
I can handle the stupid one.
The older brother may just go for it.
But is not he just a half-demon?
He is defeated demons from high and low...
and has most of the Sacred Jewel fragments.
You would better not be lying!
If you ask for an exchange...
I am sure he will gladly exchange the fragments for me!
Brother Hiten, she is got to be lying!
I think I will believe her.
If you have been lying, your pretty face will end up black and charred.
You are screaming your head off.
If you are scared, just go back.
I am going to avenge my father!
You would better be as strong as you say you are!
The Thunder Brothers have used the Sacred Jewel fragments...
That makes beating them even more fun!
Still, I am worried about Kagome!
She is got a tenacious streak in her.
According to rumors, those two brothers devour pretty girls immediately!
Does that mean Kagome has already...
Yes, I think she is very pretty, too.
I will bet she is already been eaten!
How can you stand there looking so blank?!
So she may already have been eaten up!
Tell me what is pretty about Kagome?
I have been thinking this from before...
but I think your perception of beauty is a little off.
No wonder you look and dress so weird!
A red outfit is a bit troubling.
I think you should dress with a little more refinement.
How did the subject turn to the way I dress?!
For someone yapping out loud in front of someone is front yard...
Master Inuyasha, that is the older Thunder Brother, Hiten.
Relax, I have not started eating her yet.
By your expression, looks like the woman spoke the truth.
Hand over every fragment of the Sacred Jewel!
If you want to save the woman you love!
Who would hand over the precious fragments just for you?!
You make it sound like you and I are an item!
Me or the Sacred Jewel fragments?!
If you dare choose the fragments, I will rip your lips out!
You have the fragments of the Sacred Jewel.
I am going to kill you and take'them all!
You have got brute strength, at least.
This is going to be fun!
I am getting tired of you!
Shippo, the fox tyke is seeking revenge.
With Tetsusaiga, Inuyasha should have an easy time...
defeating a Thunder Brother or two.
Hiten has three fragments and Manten has two.
Five Sacred Jewel fragments can be won or lost in this match!
But when the five fragments get into the hands of the enemy...
an even more frightening demon confronts Inuyasha!
Phantom Showdown: The Thunder Brothers vs. Tetsusaiga.
